jpcap.packet

Class IPv6Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • jpcap.packet.IPv6Option
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class IPv6Option
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents IPv6 option headers.
    See Also:
